refnamediv.refpurpose: A band pass filter working in the spectral domain.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Filter the pvoc frames, passing bins whose frequency is within a band, and with linear interpolation for transitional bands.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: fsig pvsbandp fsigin, xlowcut, xlowfull, \ xhighfull, xhighcut[, ktype]

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: xlowcut, xlowfull, xhighfull, xhighcut -- define a trapezium shape for the band that is passed. The a-rate versions only apply to the sliding case.

ktype -- specifies the shape of the transitional band. If at the default value of zero the shape is as below, with linear transition in amplitude. Other values yield and exponential shape:
(1 - exp( r*type )) / (1 - exp(type))
This includes a linear dB shape when ktype is log(10) or about 2.30.

The opcode performs a band-pass filter with a spectral envelope shaped like
klowfull __________________________ khighfull / \ / \ / \ / \ / \ ________/ \______________ klowcut khighcut
